pullrequest.title: Pass sim id to simulation instance via options

content.raw: Thanks for CCing me. It is good to know we will have some portal info within the instance itself. I also agree with the suggestion of having a way to let the instance know the url where it was called from, and not assume [dev]portal.cloudsim.io. I can imagine that could be of help when testing from a local portal in our dev machines, right?  Besides that, it looks good to me.
content.html: Thanks for CCing me. It is good to know we will have some portal info within the instance itself. I also agree with the suggestion of having a way to let the instance know the url where it was called from, and not assume [dev]portal.cloudsim.io. I can imagine that could be of help when testing from a local portal in our dev machines, right? Besides that, it looks good to me.
